name: Social Security: Social Security Disability Insurance
description: Financial assistance to people with disabilities. You only need one application to apply for all disability benefits offered by SSA.
fullDescription: Financial assistance to people with disabilities. You only need one application to apply for all disability benefits offered by SSA.
whatTheyOffer: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- You worked and paid Social Security taxes on your earnings
- The applicant is a US citizen or an eligible non-citizen
- The applicant has a disability or impairment
- The applicant is unable to work for a year or more because of a disability

Visit the official website or call for more information.
